author: Photogallery Team
title: Sad devotees, closed churches on Good Friday
description: Christians across the world are commemorating Jesus' crucifixion without the solemn church services or emotional processions of past years as they mark Good Friday on April 10, 2020 in a world locked down by the coronavirus pandemic. Pictures of sad devotees …
content: FIR filed against the man, who tried to sell 'Statue Of Unity' for Rs 30,000 cr
